channel.title: politics on The Ocean Code
channel.description: Recent content in politics on The Ocean Code

item.title: Party immigration
item.description: Objective As an immigrant myself, all of the talk of immigration to be found in main stream media outlets today makes me a bit nervous. Whereas most people that speak of the pro’s and con’s of immigration do so from the point of view of how it may affect the country of their birth, I view this issue as something that affects my ability to live outside the country of my birth.
